Midnight Court

A late-night lo-fi bounce: saturated drums and vinyl crackle frame jazzy electric piano and filtered pads; a round bassline drives the groove while reverb-soaked guitar sketches hooks. The mid-section lifts, then dissolves into tape-echo haze with a fading court-side ring.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: lo-fi hip hop, jazztronica, chillout
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 2:36
